resources.string: Display single day courses with navigation
Tap the button below to add a new task
Export period settings, semester info and other configuration data
Compatibility mode only exports course data without app-specific configuration
A semester with the same name already exists
Imported period settings differ from current settings
Please enter a valid URL (http:// or https://)
Create a new task for this date
Create a new event for this date
View all details for this date
Tap the button below to add a course
Will delete all %d schedules of \"%s\", this action cannot be undone.
This is the last schedule, deleting it will delete the entire course
Automatically switch between light and dark themes based on system settings
Automatically switch theme and colors based on time of day (Dawn/Morning/Noon/Afternoon/Dusk/Evening/Night)
Tap the button below to create your first event
Are you sure you want to delete this event? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action cannot be undone.
Used %d minutes. Mark task as complete?
Focus time is over, take a break!
Number of work sessions per cycle
Please select at least one week
Set the start date of the first week for calculating current week number
Set the total number of weeks in a semester (16-24 weeks)
Are you sure you want to delete semester \"%s\"?
Warning: This semester contains %d courses. Deleting the semester will also delete all courses!
All courses from semester \"%s\" will be copied to the new semester.
Cannot delete current semester. Please switch to another semester first.
File will be saved as .ics format
Export all courses from current semester as ICS file
Schedule exported successfully. You can share or save the file.
How would you like to match course times?
Match imported courses to your existing period settings
Automatically create period settings based on imported course times
Number of periods in the morning (1-6)
Number of periods in the afternoon (1-6)
Number of periods in the evening (0-3)
Dinner break must be between 30-120 minutes and a multiple of 5

Imported period settings differ from current settings

No subscriptions yet, tap the button below to add one

Automatically calculate next renewal date after expiration
End date must be after start date
Are you sure you want to pause this subscription?
Show persistent task input in notification bar

8 beautiful themes: Sakura, Mint, Amber, Ocean, Sunset, Forest, Aurora, Rain

Import data from previously exported ZIP or JSON files. Duplicate items will be automatically detected and skipped.
